settings.title: L'AGENCE x Keep a Breast
settings.text:
Founded in 2000, Keep A Breast's mission is to reduce breast cancer risk and its impact globally through art, education, prevention, and action. By empowering youth to become their own health advocates, Keep A Breast has educated and engaged countless women about prevention and early detection through art, creative expression, and grassroots action. Keep A Breast's new app helps guide you in your self-checks and lets you schedule a monthly reminder - so you never miss your monthly check. Download Here.

In honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, L’AGENCE will donate 20% of net proceeds from online sales on October 1, 2022 to further the Keep A Breast mission and help fund educational programs.

"We are proud to partner with L'AGENCE. We love that this partnership gives us the opportunity to reach thousands of women to empower them with education on breast health and cancer prevention. Thank you for supporting this partnership." - Shaney jo Darden, Keep A Breast Founder
*L'AGENCE pledges a minimum of $25,000 to Keep A Breast.
